title: When will autofill be getting removed?
body:
It is bad for the health of ranked. I can play every role but every role is designed to do different things in the game. Why force me to play something I wasn't planning on playing? My whole team ends up tilted because I got autofilled into a role I don't main.

why make us pick roles if we are not guaranteed to get them, that just throws out the entire balance of ranked. It is like every 5 games you play in sc2, 1 of them you have to play another race other than your main. Your mmr would be fucked and that is in a 1v1 game.

replies.body: I can play every role but am extremely single-minded. If I set out to play Top/Mid and get support, which is probably my best role, I will 99% of the time lose all interest in playing the match

It sucks for low elo players who need to focus on getting good at 2 roles to climb but Riot doesn't care, fast queues times are all that matters apparently. Even though waiting an extra 5 mins to get ur role is better than playing out a 30 minute game of fucking support and losing. Another shit decision to add to the list.

Yeah it isn't just bad for low elo players though, if you have to wait 30 mins for a game in challenger and end up getting autofilled into a role you don't main, then you are not exactly able to perform at your best and therefore are not given the same chance as everyone else in the game.
